name: DAS Technology - Solar
overview:
At DAS we believe solar energy is, quite simply, the future.

Not only does solar help safeguard the environment we leave to generations to come, but it can also earn you serious money while you’re doing it! Don’t believe us try our solar calculator!

At DAS making technology simple for our customers is what we do - whether that’s taking the time and care to explain to you exactly how solar panels work or ensuring that a solar installation takes just one day with minimum disruption – we have made our name by talking your language.

If you are interested, curious or even confused by what you’ve heard about Solar PV technology just give us a call for on 0844 414 6637 and our friendly team will be more than happy to talk the wonderful world of solar through with you.

If you’ve got a second to stay online though, why not take a look at our about solar section too to find out what renewable energy could do for your bank balance.
